title: Insiders – v1.2021-10-27 A

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Insiders-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-insiders.iso (2,404,876,288 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 2.2 to 1.7 GB)
  • Installation takes 1-2 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 4.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Overview:
Insiders is a single-player, open world survival game set within the human body. Player needs to explore the environment, follow quests, mine resources, craft items, build bases and fight microorganisms such as viruses, parasites and bacteria.

Story:
The cancer rate of human beings in this era has increased dramatically, and the only cure is inside our bodies. The technology to shrink physical objects and live beings into microscopic size has recently been discovered, and you and your ship have been shrunk and injected inside one severely ill patient with multiple diseases to find a potential cure. The patient is dying quickly, and you are the last hope of humanity to eradicate this horrible disease once and for all. Are you able to find the cure for cancer? Or are you going to find something else?

Gameplay:
This is a one-way trip, your ship needs fuel and air to keep the systems running. You can harvest resources from dead microbes or mine minerals from the blood and nutrients inside the body. You can then convert these resources to important items that will aid you in your mission. You can craft weapons, mining lasers, shields, engines and other ships components. You can also upgrade your ship software to increase speed and energy.

Combat:
Your ship can use its shields to block enemy attacks or use evasive maneuvers to dodge enemy projectiles or escape. You have cannons and ray weapons at your disposal. In time you will learn to craft even more advanced weapons and upgrade your ship to fight stronger enemies.

Scavenge:
You can find AI piloted crashed ships from previous missions inside the human body. Those wrecks could contain resources, special items, enhanced weapons and ship upgrades beneficial to your mission and survival.

Base Building:
The Building system is like a building kit. You would need to create a base frame first and attach important buildings to the frame for your survival. You can craft and build bases to store your resources, repair your ship and instantly teleport among bases. You can also build automated factories to manufacture advanced items and weapons.

Warning: This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

Game Features

  • Unique environment – explore original world like nothing else you seen
  • Fight coronavirus, bacteria and parasites face to face
  • Navigate ship across bloodstream, brain, kidney
  • Scan DNA and assemble your own bacteria as companion
  • Take care of you own brain-eating pet parasite
  • Assemble mega laser on you ship hull to destroy kidney stones
  • Follow quests, find cure for a cancer
  • Build, mine, craft, explore, survive
